full_summary:
# Programme Management Strategic Advisory Services RFP
================================ROUTE Details.cwd belongs to Kim WLa-'*

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Programme Identification**

* Title: Programme Management Strategic Advisory Services
* Reference: WS3626267714-Doc3631632575
* Amendment Number: 16
* Solicitation Number: WS3626267714
* Publication Date: August 19, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 28, 2022, at 2:00pm EDT

**Project Overview**

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) seeks a Programme Management Strategic Advisory Services firm to provide strategic advisory services to the Digital Platform Modernization (DPM) Phase 3 (P3) Programme. The programme aims to modernize and transform the digital platform, enhancing its efficiency, security, and user experience.

### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: November 18, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2029
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information: Cardinal, France (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: france.cardinal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13880264?extsite=MTM4ODAyNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Trade Agreements

The RFP is open to tenders from suppliers who are qualified under several trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Bid Requirements

Respondents are expected to submit a bid, including all required supporting documentation, by the tender closing date. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

The RFP is available on Ariba Discovery (https://acquisition.gcppcapes.giv.ncarktr paretab). Suppliers must create a profile and confirm their interest in this RFP.

Please note that the Government of Canada reserves the right to accept, reject, or cancel the entire bid process at any time. Suppliers must comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and policies during the bid process and contract execution.  response_reviewdprocess leading Clark depReply rece strategy divis13 breast apprec Western firstladığEMY
